item.title: About
item.description: this site This site is a place(holder?) for me to share some of my work and ideas. Except where otherwise noted, content on this site is licensed under the Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license. The site is built with Hugo using the hello-friend-ng theme. Big thanks to all those who have contributed to those tools! üôåüèΩ me My training is as a Software Engineer, yet I consider myself a generalist1 with interests across design, social justice, and democratizing technology through open source.
